GET:  http://localhost:3000/api/v1/vendor/activity/list?category_id=3
in case loadmore functionality then pass 'id'
header param: token

Note: In case there is no category send first category result automatically.

body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "item_take": [
                "shooes",
